Description: Lower part of a yellow quartzite figure sitting cross-legged with an unrolled papyrus across the lap; incised Hieroglyphic text on the papyrus, across the front of the legs in two rows and in columns round the sides of the plinth.
Curator's comments: See PM viii, p. 740. See Janssen-Winkeln, K., Inschriften der Spätzeit. Teil IV: Die 26. Dynastie, Vol. 2. Gottesgemahlinnen/26. Dynastie insgesamt, Wiesbaden 2014, p.811/812
